meanings.definition: A chemical group consisting of a carbonyl group attached to an amino group.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the carbamoyl in the molecule.
meanings.sent2: The medication contains a carbamoyl for its effectiveness.
meanings.sent3: The carbamoyl and amino group were best friends in the compound.
meanings.sent4: The carbamoyl acted as the bridge between the carbonyl and amino groups.
meanings.sent5: The unique structure of the carbamoyl made it stand out in the chemical formula.

meanings.definition: A compound containing the carbamoyl group.
meanings.sent1: The lab assistant synthesized a carbamoyl compound for the experiment.
meanings.sent2: The fertilizer is made up of various carbamoyl compounds.
meanings.sent3: The carbamoyl group in the compound threw a party for the other molecules.
meanings.sent4: The carbamoyl compound was a key player in the chemical reaction.
meanings.sent5: The distinct smell of the carbamoyl compound lingered in the laboratory.
